reviewText:
The DVD has a lot of footage that fans will enjoy taking a look at. The narration and the fact that the DVD is unauthorized doesnt score a high mark as a favorite among fans, yet it's cool footage to take a look at. The footage is some we haven't seen yet, so we didn't regret buying the DVD. Afterall, it has Paris Hilton in it, you cant lose!
Paris Hilton News and Reviews on YouTube

Must viewing for Anyone interested in Current Fashions,.. At least
Two Hundred Costume Changes (so it seems) and a Hundred Hair
Styles,.. Figure Two Hundred Grand alone, in Wardrobe,.. You
don't have to be a 'Mr. Blackwell' (who the heck is he?) Or 'Ya-Ya'
to appreciate this.  Yes,.. Paris wears a size eleven shoe,..

The bit about Nichole Ritchie is worth the viewing by itself,..
Eleven Tattoos? (Guess so)

Everything is probably PG-13, but still good training for any Future
Paparazzi.  Just pop it in your laptop and start up your Power DVD
Software,..and start snapping some Vid-Cap Pix's,.. (It's not as
easy as it sounds, at first.)
